TriggerOraclev10g.name: BC_TR_COMM_MASTER
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
DECLARE
dmltype CHAR;
BEGIN
IF DBMS_REPUTIL.FROM_REMOTE = FALSE THEN

IF INSERTING THEN dmltype := 'I';

INSERT INTO "OSD"."BK_COMM_MASTER"
(PROCESS_NO ,YEAR ,DEPARTMENT_NO ,TELLEGRAM_NO,
TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD,TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM,TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY,TELLEGRAM_TYPE,
TELLEGRAM_TIME ,SUBJECT ,IN_ACCOMPANIED ,INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE,
DEPT_CLASS ,SEC_LEVEL ,OLD_INCOMMING ,BARQ_TYPE,
COUNTRY_CODE ,CITY_CODE ,IN_OUT_CODE ,IN_DATE_DD,
IN_DATE_MM ,IN_DATE_YY ,DIRECTRATE_TYPE ,USER_ID,
SADER_NO, YEAR_SADER, WARED_SEC, DOC_TYPE, ID_NUMBER, INDEX_CODE,DEPT_CODE, FINISHED,
INTERY_DATE, ACTION_CODE, CREATE_DATE,P_TYPE,TIME)
VALUES
(:NEW.PROCESS_NO ,:NEW.YEAR ,:NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO ,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_NO,
:NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_TYPE,
:NEW.TELLEGRAM_TIME ,:NEW.SUBJECT ,:NEW.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,:NEW.INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE,
:NEW.DEPT_CLASS ,:NEW.SEC_LEVEL ,:NEW.OLD_INCOMMING ,:NEW.BARQ_TYPE,
:NEW.COUNTRY_CODE ,:NEW.CITY_CODE ,:NEW.IN_OUT_CODE ,:NEW.IN_DATE_DD,
:NEW.IN_DATE_MM ,:NEW.IN_DATE_YY ,:NEW.DIRECTRATE_TYPE ,:NEW.USER_ID,
:NEW.SADER_NO ,:NEW.YEAR_SADER ,:NEW.WARED_SEC ,:NEW.DOC_TYPE ,:NEW.ID_NUMBER ,:NEW.INDEX_CODE ,:NEW.DEPT_CODE ,:NEW.FINISHED ,
:NEW.INTERY_DATE ,:NEW.ACTION_CODE ,:NEW.CREATE_DATE,'I',SYSDATE);

ELSIF UPDATING THEN dmltype := 'U';

INSERT INTO "OSD"."BK_COMM_MASTER"
(PROCESS_NO ,YEAR ,DEPARTMENT_NO ,TELLEGRAM_NO,
TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD,TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM,TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY,TELLEGRAM_TYPE,
TELLEGRAM_TIME ,SUBJECT ,IN_ACCOMPANIED ,INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE,
DEPT_CLASS ,SEC_LEVEL ,OLD_INCOMMING ,BARQ_TYPE,
COUNTRY_CODE ,CITY_CODE ,IN_OUT_CODE ,IN_DATE_DD,
IN_DATE_MM ,IN_DATE_YY ,DIRECTRATE_TYPE ,USER_ID,
SADER_NO, YEAR_SADER, WARED_SEC, DOC_TYPE, ID_NUMBER, INDEX_CODE,DEPT_CODE, FINISHED,
INTERY_DATE, ACTION_CODE, CREATE_DATE,P_TYPE,TIME)
VALUES
(:NEW.PROCESS_NO ,:NEW.YEAR ,:NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO ,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_NO,
:NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_TYPE,
:NEW.TELLEGRAM_TIME ,:NEW.SUBJECT ,:NEW.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,:NEW.INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE,
:NEW.DEPT_CLASS ,:NEW.SEC_LEVEL ,:NEW.OLD_INCOMMING ,:NEW.BARQ_TYPE,
:NEW.COUNTRY_CODE ,:NEW.CITY_CODE ,:NEW.IN_OUT_CODE ,:NEW.IN_DATE_DD,
:NEW.IN_DATE_MM ,:NEW.IN_DATE_YY ,:NEW.DIRECTRATE_TYPE ,:NEW.USER_ID,
:NEW.SADER_NO ,:NEW.YEAR_SADER ,:NEW.WARED_SEC ,:NEW.DOC_TYPE ,:NEW.ID_NUMBER ,:NEW.INDEX_CODE ,:NEW.DEPT_CODE ,:NEW.FINISHED ,
:NEW.INTERY_DATE ,:NEW.ACTION_CODE ,:NEW.CREATE_DATE,'U',SYSDATE);

ELSIF DELETING THEN dmltype := 'D';

INSERT INTO "OSD"."BK_COMM_MASTER"
(PROCESS_NO ,YEAR ,DEPARTMENT_NO ,TELLEGRAM_NO,
TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD,TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM,TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY,TELLEGRAM_TYPE,
TELLEGRAM_TIME ,SUBJECT ,IN_ACCOMPANIED ,INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE,
DEPT_CLASS ,SEC_LEVEL ,OLD_INCOMMING ,BARQ_TYPE,
COUNTRY_CODE ,CITY_CODE ,IN_OUT_CODE ,IN_DATE_DD,
IN_DATE_MM ,IN_DATE_YY ,DIRECTRATE_TYPE ,USER_ID,
SADER_NO, YEAR_SADER, WARED_SEC, DOC_TYPE, ID_NUMBER, INDEX_CODE,DEPT_CODE, FINISHED,
INTERY_DATE, ACTION_CODE, CREATE_DATE,P_TYPE,TIME)
VALUES
(:OLD.PROCESS_NO ,:OLD.YEAR ,:OLD.DEPARTMENT_NO ,:OLD.TELLEGRAM_NO,
:OLD.TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD,:OLD.TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM,:OLD.TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY,:OLD.TELLEGRAM_TYPE,
:OLD.TELLEGRAM_TIME ,:OLD.SUBJECT ,:OLD.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,:OLD.INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE,
:OLD.DEPT_CLASS ,:OLD.SEC_LEVEL ,:OLD.OLD_INCOMMING ,:OLD.BARQ_TYPE,
:OLD.COUNTRY_CODE ,:OLD.CITY_CODE ,:OLD.IN_OUT_CODE ,:OLD.IN_DATE_DD,
:OLD.IN_DATE_MM ,:OLD.IN_DATE_YY ,:OLD.DIRECTRATE_TYPE ,:old.USER_ID,
:OLD.SADER_NO ,:OLD.YEAR_SADER ,:OLD.WARED_SEC ,:OLD.DOC_TYPE ,:OLD.ID_NUMBER ,:OLD.INDEX_CODE ,:OLD.DEPT_CODE ,:OLD.FINISHED ,
:OLD.INTERY_DATE ,:OLD.ACTION_CODE ,:OLD.CREATE_DATE,'D',SYSDATE);
END IF;
END IF;
END;
